title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
NA] Draw on the zaith'isk's power, take it as your own. Embrace the pain, Lae'zel. Be pure. Wait and Watch.

Choosing dialogue 4 will allow you to make a DC 30 Arcana check. Success grants you the Awakened feature and destroys the device as above. Choosing dialogue 5 will gain the approval of Lae'zel.
